name: Gallop Racer 2006
synopsis: Compete against legendary horses and see how you fare against the greats. Create your own horse and jockey to form the winning combination! Collect "stars" to unlock a variety of horses. Pick the color, type and even name from thousands of horses or create your own jockey from hundreds of choices! Raise, breed and train a horse as a thoroughbred owner. Select a jockey that gives you that winning edge to take your team to the top of the Gallop Racer circuit.
